title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7202.7 - Hours for public access to records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7202.7 - Hours for public access to records

State Regulations

Requests for public access to records of the commission
shall be accepted, and records produced, on any business day between the hours
of 9 a.m. and 4 p.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7202.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
